usernameToBindDnConverter - Variable in class org.bremersee.spring.security.authentication.ldaptive.LdaptiveAuthenticationProperties
The username (like 'anna') to bind dn (like 'cn=anna,ou=people,dc=example,dc=org') converter.
UsernameToBindDnConverter - Interface in org.bremersee.spring.security.authentication.ldaptive
Converts a username (like 'foobar') into it's bind dn (like 'uid=foobar,ou=people,dc=example,dc=org').
UsernameToBindDnConverter.ByDomainEmail - Class in org.bremersee.spring.security.authentication.ldaptive
Converts a username (like 'foobar') into it's (active directory) bind dn (like 'foobar@example.org').

The type By user rdn attribute.

The object class of the user (like 'inetOrgPerson').
userRdnAttribute - Variable in class org.bremersee.spring.security.authentication.ldaptive.LdaptiveAuthenticationProperties
Applies only for simple bind.
